idea-plugin.name: Env File Masker
idea-plugin.description:
A security-focused plugin that automatically masks sensitive values in .env files.
Features: - Automatically detects and masks values in .env files - Click to reveal/hide sensitive information - Works with all IntelliJ-based IDEs - Helps prevent accidental exposure of sensitive data
Perfect for teams working with environment variables containing sensitive information like API keys, passwords, and tokens.
